senceSetting_SetUpScreenPc: and install it on the control computer of the screen.
senceSetting_HowToDetectionAlert: NovaiCare will smartly analyze the pictures taken by the camera and evaluate the display effect. If there is any problem, NovaiCare will send alarm emails to users, so as to ensure an optimum display status all the time.
senceSetting_DetectionAlert: During detection, the Smart Detection Assistant will play test patterns on the screen for 100 seconds. Please set the detection time to be at night or at the time when nothing is played on the screen.
senceSetting_PointAlert: Please mark out the LED display range. (Note: Please disable watermark in camera configuration. The capture interval must be set to 30 seconds. Do not include the images of surrounding objects within this range, otherwise there may be false alarms.)
senceSetting_closedShape: The detection range you marked out must be a closed shape. Please try again.
senceSetting_isTurnOff: Disabling the camera will turn off smart display detection. Do you want to continue?
senceSetting_markedOut: The detection range you marked out must be within the screen.
senceSetting_detectPictures: The system will detect the pictures taken by the camera. If the screen has black or dark blocks and brighter blocks, the system will send email reminders to users. The detection is more efficient when the displayed contents are videos.
senceSetting_supportCamera: Supports cameras with FTP function only.
senceSetting_HowToMark: How to mark out the detection range?
senceSetting_markedNotIncluded: The watermark cannot be included within the detection range you marked out.
senceSetting_OneMinuteMarked: Please set the snapshot interval to 1 minute to ensure the efficiency of smart display detection.
senceSetting_SelectisNotmore: At most 20 mouse clicks are allowed when you are marking out a detection range. Please try again.

jumpToFeedback: To offer better services for you, we"d like you to complete
ques1: 1. Which function(s) in iCare are you most concerned about? (Select all that apply)
ques2: 2. What questions or suggestions do you have for the function(s) you are concerned about?
ques3: 3. What other functions do you want the system to provide?
ques4: 4. Which industry does your company belong to?
ques5: 5. What are the types of faults that often occur to your screens?
ques6: 6. You usually repair the faults by:
ques6OptionA: A. Asking the screen manufacturer for after-sales repairs
ques6OptionB: B. Contacting the local maintenance personnel
chatGuide: A work order system is provided. You can leave messages and check replies at any time.
